[prep CDF-24921] ðŸ§® Raw row count (#1621)

# Description

<del>Stacked on #1620 </del>

This adds a function for counting number of rows in a raw table. It will
be used as part of the `cdf profile raw` command.

- [x] Patch

### Fixed

for files
